snippet: A friend of former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez has been acquitted of murder in the shooting death of a man Hernandez was convicted of killing....
lead_paragraph: A friend of former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez has been acquitted of murder in the shooting death of a man Hernandez was convicted of killing.

headline.main: Ex-Patriots Player Hernandez's Friend Is Acquitted of Murder
headline.print_headline: Ex-Patriots Player Hernandez's Friend Is Acquitted of Murder
